attributes.action: lobby on behalf of British football supporters, returning the game to its roots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of current events at Newcastle United, where yet another football club is being mismanaged by a self-serving billionaire the Prime Minister and Department for Culture, Media and Sport should act on behalf of exasperated football supporters. Especially during these tough economic times, it is essential that clubs be run by people who understand the fans, football and the area they represent, rather than continuosly raising ticket prices and treating supporters with disdain.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
